key.name: history-size
key.description: Number of clipboard entries to keep before discarding oldest unpinned items.

key.name: poll-interval-ms
key.description: How often to poll clipboard contents to detect changes.

key.name: shortcut
key.description: Keybinding used to show the clipboard popup.

key.name: persist-history
key.description: When enabled, history is saved under the user cache directory.

key.name: track-primary
key.description: When enabled, also record PRIMARY selections (middle-click paste buffer). Useful on X11; Wayland behavior depends on compositor.

key.name: auto-paste
key.description: Automatically simulate paste after selecting an item. This is not available on Wayland for security reasons.

key.name: paste-as-plain-text
key.description: When enabled, pasted output strips formatting/HTML. Shift+Enter always pastes plain text.

key.name: pause-capture
key.description: When enabled, clipboard changes are ignored until resumed.

key.name: enable-secure-heuristics
key.summary: Skip capture in likely secure contexts
key.description: Best-effort heuristic to avoid capturing clipboard from known secure contexts (e.g., password prompts) based on window/app class names.

key.name: skip-wm-classes
key.description: When a focused window class matches any of these, clipboard captures are skipped. Useful for password managers or browsers.

key.name: max-rich-bytes
key.description: Upper bound for stored HTML/RTF payloads to avoid bloat (bytes).

key.name: emoji-recents
key.description: Stores recently picked emoji to surface in the emoji picker.

key.name: popup-position
key.description: Where to show the popup: 'window' (near top of focused window) or 'mouse' (near mouse cursor).
